meaningMnemonic: Something that's <kanji>behind</kanji> your <kanji>back</kanji> is in the <vocabulary>background</vocabulary>. It's also probably plotting against you, <vocabulary>behind the scenes</vocabulary>. Sneaky, sneaky.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. As long as you know the readings for these kanji, you should be able to read this word just fine.
